photos.title: Sweet Lotus
photos.description: Pre-Order your book now! Sweet Lotus is a fictional cookbook tie-in for the fictional restaurant, The Lotus Cafe. This design is for a landing page for the website to order a copy of the book.

photos.title: The Little Lemon
photos.description: Reserve a table at The Little Lemon! This is a series of screens demonstrating how a user would move through the processes of reserving a table using the Little Lemon restaurant app.

photos.title: Eye Design Eyeglasses
photos.description: This is a landing page for the Eye Design eyeglasses store. Eye Design is a high end glasses retailer located near the ocean in Florida.

photos.title: Midnight Munchies Icons
photos.description: Midnight Munchies! The concept for this design was an app dedicated to delivering late night snacks. The bright color palette and glowing edges is reminiscent of neon lights in a city.

photos.title: Sign Up Form
photos.description: Sign up for our newsletter! This is a website pop-up overlay sign up form. The concept was a website for a trendy clothing store.

photos.title: The Lucky Shrub
photos.description: This was the first version of the header for the Lucky Shrub Landscaping Company website. The Lucky Shrub is a fictional landscaping company based in Phoenix, AZ.

photos.title: Travel the World
photos.description: View images from around the world with this design! This is a set of collapsing images depicting scenes from around the world. This could easily be adapted to fit into any image heavy website.
